widget.name: JSON AJAX Test
widget.description: A Sample Projekt that send data to a server and list the json objekts that the server is responding to a list. XAMPP or an other Servfer has to be setup and the index.php in the AJAX_test folder used to as requested target. For XAMMP remove all data out of the htdocs folder and put the index.php in it.
widget.author: Jsoua Arndt
